EmailTemplate.name: Welcome Note
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to {!EventName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello {!Name}, Welcome to {!EventName} Congratulations on taking the first step towards signing-up with a great lead retrieval application Boothleads the one of its kind. An authentic application to have all your leads on the go. For more information, Please visit www.boothleads.com Need Help ? We are right here. Contact us at support@boothleads.com . Thank you! BoothLeads Customer Support support@boothleads.com Phone: 1-(800)-492-1289
